Appendix 6 (Continued)
-(Dr. Eldon L* Johnson, President) — "The NAEB Consultation Team**.*
vas of tremendous assistance to us in our efforts to activate Channel 11 in
Durham...* The report itself has been of tremendous value to us, both with
our University Trustees and with key people in the state at large. We needed
something like this to give everyone some greater confidence that we are
*on the right track*„»«. we seem to have won the battle for the preservation
of the channel and for minimal operation* * *« Many thanks again for your
splendid assistance*’*
